about.description: Hi! I'm Nelson Lai, a passionate web development student creating innovative projects with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Explore my portfolio, skills, and journey in building user-friendly apps. Let's connect!

account.edit-name-description: Change your display name. This name will be shown on your profile and comments.

blog.description: Discover my website and blog, where I share tutorials, notes, and experiences as a full-stack engineer based in Hong Kong. I began web dev as a hobby in Dec 2020. Explore my journey!

delete-comment.description: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.
delete-comment.title: Delete a comment

dashboard.description: This is my personal dashboard, built with Next.js API routes deployed as serverless functions. I use this dashboard to track various stats across platforms like YouTube, GitHub, and more.

design.description: Explore the design system and UI components used throughout this website. View component variants, styles, and implementation examples.

sign-in.notice: By continuing, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>

error.avatar-too-large: Avatar file is too large. Please choose a file smaller than {size} MB.
error.avatar-unsupported-file: Please choose a supported image type (JPEG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, AVIF).
error.copy-to-clipboard-error: Unable to copy to clipboard. Please try again.
error.failed-to-fetch-comments-data: Failed to fetch comments data. Please refresh the page.
error.failed-to-fetch-users-data: Failed to fetch users data. Please refresh the page.
error.failed-to-load-comments: Failed to load comments. Please refresh the page.
error.failed-to-load-messages: Failed to load messages. Please refresh the page.
error.failed-to-load-replies: Failed to load replies. Please refresh the page.
error.failed-to-load-settings: Failed to load settings. Please refresh the page.
error.like-limit-reached: You can only like 3 times per post
error.need-logged-in-to-vote: You need to be logged in to vote comments

error.sign-out-failed: Sign out failed. Please try again.
error.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.update-avatar-failed: Failed to update avatar. Please try again.

guestbook.description: Sign my guestbook and share your idea. You can tell me anything here!
guestbook.no-messages: No messages. Be the first to leave a message!

pinned.description: Thanks for visiting my website. If you have a moment, I'd love to hear your thoughts on my work. Please log in with your account to leave a comment. Thanks!

get-in-touch.description: Feel free to reach out to me!
get-in-touch.title: Any questions about Next.js?

hero.title-top: I'm Nelson, a Full Stack Engineer

metadata.site-description: Nelson Lai is a full stack engineer based in Hong Kong. He builds performant and elegant websites using React, Node.js, and modern technologies.

privacy.description: This page explains how we handle your data and protect your privacy when you use our website.

projects.description: A collection of my projects, crafted with dedication.

settings.reply-notification-description: Receive email notifications when someone replies to your comment.

terms.description: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use our website.

unsubscribe.invalid-link-description: The unsubscribe link is invalid. Please try again.
unsubscribe.stop-receiving-email-notifications: Stop receiving email notifications for replies to this comment
unsubscribe.unsubscribed-description: You will no longer receive reply notifications emails for this comment.

uses.description: This is the equipment I currently use for gaming, programming, making videos, and every day.
